00026 #include "httpmessage.h"
00027 
00028 #define MAPPED_MEMORY_SIZE 64
00029 
00030 HttpMessage::HttpMessage(HttpVersion httpVersion) :
00031         m_httpVersion(httpVersion),
00032         m_entityBodyDevice(NULL)
00033 {
00034 }
00035 
00036 HttpMessage::~HttpMessage()
00037 {
00038     if (m_entityBodyDevice)
00039         m_entityBodyDevice->deleteLater();
00040 }
00041 
00042 void HttpMessage::setHttpVersion(const HttpVersion &version)
00043 {
00044     m_httpVersion = version;
00045 }
00046 
00047 void HttpMessage::setHeader(const QByteArray &name, const QByteArray &value)
00048 {
00049     if (!name.isEmpty()) {
00050         if (!value.isNull())
00051             // sets the value
00052             m_headers[name] = value;
00053         else
00054             // erases the header
00055             m_headers.remove(name);
00056     }
00057 }
00058 
00059 qint64 HttpMessage::entityBody(QIODevice *device) const
00060 {
00061     if (!device->isWritable())
00062         return -1;
00063 
00064     qint64 numberByteWritten = 0;
00065 
00066     if (m_entityBodyDevice) {
00067         m_entityBodyDevice->seek(0);
00068         while (!m_entityBodyDevice->atEnd())
00069             numberByteWritten += device->write(m_entityBodyDevice->read(MAPPED_MEMORY_SIZE));
00070     } else {
00071         numberByteWritten += device->write(m_entityBody);
00072     }
00073 
00074     return numberByteWritten;
00075 }
00076 
00077 void HttpMessage::setEntityBody(const QByteArray &body)
00078 {
00079     if (m_entityBodyDevice) {
00080         m_entityBodyDevice->deleteLater();
00081         m_entityBodyDevice = NULL;
00082     }
00083     m_entityBody = body;
00084 }
00085 
00086 bool HttpMessage::setEntityBody(QIODevice *bodyDevice)
00087 {
00088     if (!bodyDevice->isReadable() || bodyDevice->isSequential())
00089         return false;
00090 
00091     if (m_entityBodyDevice) {
00092         m_entityBodyDevice->deleteLater();
00093         m_entityBodyDevice = NULL;
00094     } else {
00095         m_entityBody.clear();
00096     }
00097 
00098     m_entityBodyDevice = bodyDevice;
00099     m_entityBodyDevice->setParent(NULL);
00100 
00101     return true;
00102 }
